com.bigdata.counters

Interface IStatisticsCollector

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ICounterSetAccess
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractProcessCollector, AbstractStatisticsCollector, IOStatCollector, PIDStatCollector, SarCpuUtilizationCollector, StatisticsCollectorForLinux, StatisticsCollectorForOSX, StatisticsCollectorForWindows, TypeperfCollector, VMStatCollector, VMStatCollector

    public interface IStatisticsCollector
extends ICounterSetAccess
    Interface for collecting performance counters for a host or a process.
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Bryan Thompson
